name: MonoTreasure
description:
This is a game developed in 48 hours for the GMTK Jame Jam 2019, whose theme is "only one". You're a treasure hunter, going through the catacombs to find the most valuable treasure -- except you only have one inventory slot!

Each item has their own in-game value and weight. The heavier the treasure, the slower you run! Balance finding the rarest of treasures with making it out in time!

Controls

WASD - Move Left Shift - Inventory

Thoughts

This game was very fun to make! This was my first time participating in a game jam. Due to time constraints, I didn't get the chance to implement everything I wanted to put into the game, and there's definitely bugs. However, I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!

Credits

Kevin Quan - Game design, programming, additional art

Additional Art:
16x16 DungeonTileset II - 0x72 - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
